result.eng: The men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ga: chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.orig: chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.html: chaith na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ponchtml: ċaiṫ na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.

result.eng: Their living conditions were bad.
result.ga: bhí a dtosca marachtála go dona
result.orig: bhí a dtosca marachtála go dona
result.html: bhí a dtosca marachtála go donaTheir living conditions were bad.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a dtosca maraċtála go donaTheir living conditions were bad.

result.eng: Healthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.
result.ga: bíonn an spórt ina dhlúthchuid den saol ag daoine atá folláin
result.orig: bíonn an spórt ina dhlúthchuid den saol ag daoine atá folláin
result.html: bíonn an spórt ina dhlúthchuid den saol ag daoine atá folláinHealthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.
result.ponchtml: bíonn an spórt ina ḋlúṫċuid den saol ag daoine atá folláinHealthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.

result.eng: It's hard for children when their parents separate.
result.ga: bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéile
result.orig: bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéile
result.html: bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéileIt's hard for children when their parents separate.
result.ponchtml: bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismiṫeoirí óna ċéileIt's hard for children when their parents separate.

result.eng: The politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ga: caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.orig: caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.html: caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ na polaiteoirí gearraḋ siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.

result.eng: I spent a while in their company.
result.ga: chaith mé tamall ina gcomhluadar
result.orig: chaith mé tamall ina gcomhluadar
result.html: chaith mé tamall ina gcomhluadarI spent a while in their company.
result.ponchtml: ċaiṫ mé tamall ina gcoṁluadarI spent a while in their company.

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ga: cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.orig: cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.html: cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oícheYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ponchtml: ċeapfá óna gcuid cainte go raiḃ siad ag bualaḋ craicinn gaċ oíċeYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ga: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.orig: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.html: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ponchtml: fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ga: níl fios a ngnó acu
result.orig: níl fios a ngnó acu
result.html: níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ponchtml: níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.eng: All they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ga: níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.orig: níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.html: níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ponchtml: níl uaṫu aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċ ar a gcuid sean-naiṁdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.

result.eng: They extended their hands as a sign of peace.
result.ga: shín siad a lámha amach mar chomartha síochána
result.orig: shín siad a lámha amach mar chomartha síochána
result.html: shín siad a lámha amach mar chomartha síochánaThey extended their hands as a sign of peace.
result.ponchtml: ẛín siad a láṁa amaċ mar ċomarṫa síoċánaThey extended their hands as a sign of peace.

result.eng: It is important not to breach their human rights.
result.ga: tá sé tábhachtach nach sárófaí a gcearta daonna
result.orig: tá sé tábhachtach nach sárófaí a gcearta daonna
result.html: tá sé tábhachtach nach sárófaí a gcearta daonnaIt is important not to breach their human rights.
result.ponchtml: tá sé táḃaċtaċ naċ sárófaí a gcearta daonnaIt is important not to breach their human rights.

result.eng: A large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ga: bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.orig: bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.html: bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidhA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ponchtml: ḃí slua mór daoine bailiṫe timpeall an tí agus dreaċ an ḃróin ar a n-aġaiḋA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ga: bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.orig: bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.html: bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ponchtml: ḃí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíoċta a ċur os coṁair an ṗobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: d'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: d'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: d'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: Their mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ga: tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.orig: tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.html: tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig uisce lena ḃfiacla ar ṁéad is a ḃí d'ocras orṫuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: bhí madraí leis ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: bhí madraí leis ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: bhí madraí leis ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: ḃí madraí leis ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.

result.eng: Their legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ga: bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.orig: bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuair
result.html: bhí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a gcosa ag lapadaíl san uisce fionnuairTheir legs were splashing about in the cool water.

result.eng: ...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ga: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.orig: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.html: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ponchtml: sular ṫug siad aġaiḋ ar a dtiṫe murtallaċa sna bruaċḃailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.

result.eng: The images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ga: bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.orig: bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.html: bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ponchtml: ḃain na híoṁánna bíogaḋ asam lena gcuid áilleaċta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh ag na naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh ag na naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh ag na naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: This was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ga: rinneadh seo in aerfort na sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hiaráice
result.orig: rinneadh seo in aerfort na sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hiaráice
result.html: rinneadh seo in aerfort na sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hiaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ponchtml: rinneaḋ seo in aerfort na sionainne áit a ḃfeictear na mílte saiġdiúirí meiriceánaċa gaċ lá anois ar a mbealaċ ċun na hiaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ga: is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.orig: is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.html: is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ponchtml: is beag aisċoṫú a fuair scríḃneoirí áiriṫe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: Many ordinary people have a gun in their possession.
result.ga: is iomaí gnáthdhuine a bhfuil gunna ina sheilbh
result.orig: is iomaí gnáthdhuine a bhfuil gunna ina sheilbh
result.html: is iomaí gnáthdhuine a bhfuil gunna ina sheilbhMany ordinary people have a gun in their possession.
result.ponchtml: is iomaí gnáṫḋuine a ḃfuil gunna ina ẛeilḃMany ordinary people have a gun in their possession.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: níor stop na naitsiṫe leis an bpolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.
result.ga: ghlac na lochlannaigh seilbh ar eabhrac sa bhliain 867
result.orig: ghlac na lochlannaigh seilbh ar eabhrac sa bhliain 867
result.html: ghlac na lochlannaigh seilbh ar eabhrac sa bhliain 867The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.
result.ponchtml: ġlac na loċlannaiġ seilḃ ar eaḃrac sa ḃliain 867The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.

result.eng: They were waiting for their turn.
result.ga: bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.orig: bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.html: bhí siad ag feitheamh lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag feiṫeaṁ lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ga: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.orig: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.html: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ponchtml: is cosúil go ḃfuil sé de ḃuaiḋ orṫu a ḃeiṫ tugṫa don ġloine mar ṁáistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: I was their only child.
result.ga: ní raibh acu ach mé
result.orig: ní raibh acu ach mé
result.html: ní raibh acu ach méI was their only child.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ acu aċ méI was their only child.

result.eng: They have their guns pointed at the door.
result.ga: tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acu
result.orig: tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acu
result.html: tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acuThey have their guns pointed at the door.
result.ponchtml: tá na gunnaí aimsiṫe ar an doras acuThey have their guns pointed at the door.
